name: exlink
description: jQuery.exLink forces all external links (specified by protocol) and documents (specified by format) to open in a new tab. jQuery.exLink also suports a viausal notification that users are navigating to an external site, or opening a document. This plugin is easy to use, lightweight and completely configurable.
keywords: jquery, external, links, jquery-plugin, documents, open, new-tab, external-urls, yupitszac, modal, ecosystem:jquery
author: Zac Brown
